title: Cavendish’s Leadout Ace Michael Mørkøv Exits Tour de France with COVID as Fear of Sickness Sweeps Peloton
content:
Sprint mastermind leaves final Tour after positive test in latest of wave of riders leaving the Tour with sickness.

Read the full article at Cavendish’s Leadout Ace Michael Mørkøv Exits Tour de France with COVID as Fear of Sickness Sweeps Peloton on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
